name: Still Alive
description:
"Still Alive" is a sci-fi visual novel about Mirai Alloris who lives with her mother and sister in one of the inhabited sectors hidden from the radars of the enemy. One day some mechanical monsters attack their sector, they slaughter Mirai’s mother and her sister Aila is kidnapped. After the attack, Mirai finds herself in the human resistance movement's headquarters. She thinks that the members of the resistance who save her can also help save her sister, but it turns out that they have other plans. Thus she escapes and goes to City-5 where the enemy base is located, trying to find her sister. However, it is no easy task, as death waits around every corner there...



* Dark and brutal world of the future.
* Original atmospheric soundtrack.
* Fast paced narration.
* Exciting unpredictable story.
* Many choices with an unexpected outcome.
* A variety of battles with enemies.
* Unusual mechanics of character upgrade.
